summary: Simply, this mod makes some of the Orc hairstyles available for both male and female Khajiits.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][color=#c27ba0]♥ ♥ ♥[/color] [url=http://www.twitch.tv/aluckymuse][color=#ffffff]Wanna see how I do it?[/color] [color=#c27ba0]Live Skyrim modding[/color] [color=#ffffff]on Mondays over on Twitch![/color][/url] [color=#c27ba0]♥ ♥ ♥[/color][/size][/center]

[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/48442-0-1498929930.png[/img][/center]
[center]...This was gathering dust on my hard-drive so I decided to release it. Simply, this mod makes some of the Orc hairstyles available for both male and female Khajiits. The hair was meant for Orcs so a few of the hair styles look largely unpolished, but some look pretty darn good. [/center]


[color=#c27ba0][font=impact][size=5]Installation:[/size][/font][/color]
Requires nothing extra. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?][color=#c27ba0]RaceMenu[/color][/url] recommended. Use a mod manager or manually unpack the zip into your Skyrim data folder.


[color=#c27ba0][font=impact][size=5]Uninstallation:[/size][/font][/color]
Will not damage your save file. Use a mod manager or manually delete MKH.esp from your Skyrim data folder.

[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/20700-5-1498929504.png[/img][/center]

[center][size=4]If you use this mod on your Khajiit character feel free to upload a picture![/size][/center]
[right][url=https://www.youtube.com/c/aluckymuse][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/20700-2-1498929504.png[/img][/url][/right]
[center][/center]








[center][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YpTy5CbuLzI][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/20700-1-1498929504.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/20700-3-1498929504.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59849/?][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/20700-0-1498929504.png[/img][/url][/center]
author: aluckymuse
